sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Row style="padding-top: 20px;background: #fff;">
    <Col span="22" offset="1">
<!--      {{formItem}}-->
<!--      {{onNextNodeIdObj}}-->
      <Form class="ui-combination-form" ref="formItem" :model="formItem" :rules="formItemValidate" :label-width="160">
        <FormItem label="节点号" prop="id">
          <Input v-model="formItem.id" placeholder="请输入..." disabled></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="节点名称" prop="name">
          <Input v-model="formItem.name" placeholder="请输入..."></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="时间组" prop="workTimeGroupId">
          <Select v-model="formItem.workTimeGroupId">
            <Option :value="item.id" v-for="(item,i) in timeGroupList" :key="i">{{item.name}}</Option>
          </Select>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="工作时间跳转节点" prop="onWorkNextNodeId">
          <Select v-model="formItem.onWorkNextNodeId">
            <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in NextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>
          </Select>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="节假日跳转" prop="onHolidayNextNodeId">
          <Row>
            <Col span="6">
              <Select v-model="formItem.onHolidayMode">
                <Option value="1">跳转节点</Option>
                <Option value="2">转手机队列</Option>
              </Select>
            </Col>
            <Col span="18" style="padding-left: 15px">
              <Select v-model="formItem.onHolidayNextNodeId">
                <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in NextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>
              </Select>
            </Col>
          </Row>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="工作时间跳转节点" prop="otherTimeNextNodeId">
          <Row>
            <Col span="6">
              <Select v-model="formItem.otherTimeMode">
                <Option value="1">跳转节点</Option>
                <Option value="2">转手机队列</Option>
              </Select>
            </Col>
            <Col span="18" style="padding-left: 15px">
              <Select v-model="formItem.otherTimeNextNodeId">
                <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in NextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>
              </Select>
            </Col>
          </Row>
<!--          <Select v-model="formItem.otherTimeNextNodeId">-->
<!--            <Option :value="item.value" v-for="(item,i) in nextNodeIdList" :key="i">{{item.text}}</Option>-->
<!--          </Select>-->
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem label="说明" prop="describe">
          <Input type="textarea" v-model="formItem.describe" placeholder="请输入..."></Input>
        </FormItem>
        <FormItem>
          <Button @click="btnOk" type="primary">确定</Button>
          <Button @click="btnCancel" style="margin-left: 8px">取消</Button>
        </FormItem>
      </Form>
    </Col>
  </Row>
</template>

<script>
import {
  getWorktimeGroups,
  getAllCtiList,
} from "@/api/index";
import voiceManage from "@/views/sys/voice-manage/voiceManage";
import processVariables from "@/views/my-components/IVR/processVariables";
// import {getWorktimeGroups} from "@/api";
var frame = parent;
export default {
  name: "SetNode_WorkTime",
  components:{voiceManage,processVariables},
  data(){
    return{
      openerid:WFCore.GetQuery("openerid"),
      stepid:WFCore.GetQuery("id"),
      NextNodeIdList:[{value:0,text:'无'}],
      timeGroupList:[],
      RelayGroupShow:true,
      formItem:{
        id:'',//节点号
        name:'',//节点名称
        workTimeGroupId:'',//时间组
        onWorkNextNodeId:0,//工作时间跳转节点
        onHolidayMode:1,//节假日跳转-类型
        onHolidayNextNodeId:0,//节假日跳转
        otherTimeMode:1,//其他时间跳转-类型
        otherTimeNextNodeId:0,//其他时间跳转
        sort:'',//排序序号
        describe:'',//说明
        relayGroupId:'',//中继组
        relayPhone:'',//中继号码
      },
      onNextNodeIdObj:{
        onWorkNextNodeId:0,//工作时间跳转节点
        onHolidayNextNodeId:0,//节假日跳转节点
        otherTimeNextNodeId:0,//其他时间跳转节点
      },
      formItemValidate:{
        name: [{
          required: true,
          message: this.$t("pleaseEnter"),
          trigger: "blur",
        }],
      }
    }
  },
  methods:{
    init(){
      this.initData();
      this.getWorktimeGroups();
    },
    //获取时间组
    getWorktimeGroups() {
      getWorktimeGroups({}).then((res) => {
        if (res.success) {
          this.timeGroupList = res.result;
          this.formItem.workTimeGroupId=res.result[0].id;
        }
      });
    },
    initData(){
      var than=this;
      if (frame == null) return;
      than.flowdata=top.wMyflowData;
      than.step = than.flowdata.getNode(than.stepid);
      if(than.flowdata.nodes.size()>0){
        than.flowdata.nodes.each(function (nodeId,node,index){
          if(than.step.checkNextNodeIsAllow("onWorkNextNodeId",node.id)){
            than.NextNodeIdList.push({value:node.id,text:[node.id]+'-' + node.getText()})
          }
        })
      }
      // if(than.flowdata.nodes.size()>0){
      //   than.flowdata.nodes.each(function (nodeId,node,index){
      //     if(than.step.checkNextNodeIsAllow("onHolidayNextNodeId",node.id)){
      //       than.onHolidayNextNodeIdList.push({value:node.id,text:[node.id]+'-' + node.getText()})
      //     }
      //   })
      // }
      // if(than.flowdata.nodes.size()>0){
      //   than.flowdata.nodes.each(function (nodeId,node,index){
      //     if(than.step.checkNextNodeIsAllow("otherTimeNextNodeId",node.id)){
      //       than.otherTimeNextNodeIdList.push({value:node.id,text:[node.id]+'-' + node.getText()})
      //     }
      //   })
      // }

      this.initStep(than.step);
    },
    initStep(step) {
      var than=this;
      if(step==null||step==undefined){
        than.formItem.name='新流程';
        return;
      }
      than.formItem.id=step.id;
      than.formItem.name=step.getText();
      than.formItem.sort=step.sort;
      than.formItem.describe=step.describe;

      than.formItem.onHolidayMode=step.onHolidayMode.toString();
      than.formItem.workTimeGroupId=step.workTimeGroupId;
      than.formItem.otherTimeMode=step.otherTimeMode.toString();
      than.formItem.onHolidaySeatGroupId=step.onHolidaySeatGroupId;
      than.formItem.relayGroupId=step.relayGroupId;
      than.formItem.relayPhone=step.relayPhone;

      window.setTimeout(function (){
      //   //工作时间跳转节点
        than.ShowNodeResult("onWorkNextNodeId","#onWorkNextNodeId",0);
      },100)
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //节假日跳转节点
        than.ShowNodeResult("onHolidayNextNodeId","#onHolidayNextNodeId",0);
      },100)
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //其他时间跳转节点
        than.ShowNodeResult("otherTimeNextNodeId","#otherTimeNextNodeId",0);
      },200)

    },
    //给NodeResult控件赋值
    ShowNodeResult(resultName,nextNodeCtlId,isDefault){
      var than=this;
      if(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName) != null && than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId > 0)
      {
        than.formItem[resultName]=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        if(resultName=='onWorkNextNodeId'){
          than.onNextNodeIdObj.onWorkNextNodeId=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        }
        if(resultName=='onHolidayNextNodeId'){
          than.onNextNodeIdObj.onHolidayNextNodeId=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        }
        if(resultName=='otherTimeNextNodeId'){
          than.onNextNodeIdObj.otherTimeNextNodeId=parseInt(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).nextNodeId);
        }
      }
    },
    //保存NodeResult控件所选下一节点
    SaveNodeResult(resultName,nextNodeCtlId,describe,isDefault){
      var than=this;
      if(than.step.getNodeResult(resultName) != null){
        if(than.formItem[resultName] != null && than.formItem[resultName] != "" && than.formItem[resultName] != 0)
        {
          var nodeResult = than.step.getNodeResult(resultName).restore({
            nextNodeId:isNaN(than.formItem[resultName]) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem[resultName]) || 0,
            isDefault:isDefault || 0
          });
          if(nodeResult != null) nodeResult.drawNodeResult();
        }
        else
        {
          than.step.removeNodeResult(resultName);
        }
      }
      else{
        if(than.formItem[resultName] != null && than.formItem[resultName] != "")
        {
          var nodeResult = than.step.createNodeResult({
            name:resultName,
            nextNodeId:isNaN(than.formItem[resultName]) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem[resultName]) || 0,
            isDefault:isDefault || 0,
            describe:describe
          });
          if(nodeResult != null) nodeResult.drawNodeResult();
        }
      }
    },
    btnOk(){
      var than=this;
      this.$refs["formItem"].validate((valid) => {
        if (valid) {
          this.confirm1();
        }else {
          this.$Message.error('请输入版本号');
        }
      })
    },
    confirm1() {
      var than=this;
      var ostep = {
        text: {
          text: than.formItem.name
        },
        sort: than.formItem.sort,
        describe: than.formItem.describe,
        workTimeGroupId: than.formItem.workTimeGroupId,
        onHolidayMode: isNaN(than.formItem.onHolidayMode) ? 1 : parseInt(than.formItem.onHolidayMode) || 1,
        onHolidaySeatGroupId: isNaN(than.formItem.onHolidaySeatGroupId) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem.onHolidaySeatGroupId) || 0,
        otherTimeMode: isNaN(than.formItem.otherTimeMode) ? 1 : parseInt(than.formItem.otherTimeMode) || 1,
        otherTimeSeatGroupId: isNaN(than.formItem.otherTimeSeatGroupId) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem.otherTimeSeatGroupId) || 0,
        relayGroupId : than.formItem.relayGroupId,
        relayGroupNo : isNaN(than.formItem.relayGroupNo) ? 0 : parseInt(than.formItem.relayGroupNo) || 0,
        relayPhone :than.formItem.relayPhone || "",
      };


      //跳转节点
      //than.SaveNodeResult("nextNodeId","#base_NextNodeId","跳转节点",1);
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //工作时间跳转节点
        than.SaveNodeResult("onWorkNextNodeId","#onWorkNextNodeId","工作时间跳转节点",0);
      },200)
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //节假日跳转节点
        than.SaveNodeResult("onHolidayNextNodeId","#onHolidayNextNodeId","节假日跳转节点",0);
      },400)
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        //其他时间跳转节点
        than.SaveNodeResult("otherTimeNextNodeId","#otherTimeNextNodeId","其他时间跳转节点",0);
      },600)
      than.step.restore(ostep);
      window.setTimeout(function (){
        new RoadUI.Window().close();
      },1200)
    },
    btnCancel(){
      new RoadUI.Window().close();
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.init();
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
